> ⚠️ **Unstable**: This @std package is experimental and its API may change without a major version bump.

## Overview

<p>Utilities for generating random numbers.</p>
<pre class="highlight"><code><span class="pl-k">import</span> { randomIntegerBetween } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/random"</span>;
<span class="pl-k">import</span> { randomSeeded } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/random"</span>;
<span class="pl-k">import</span> { assertEquals } <span class="pl-k">from</span> <span class="pl-s">"@std/assert"</span>;

<span class="pl-k">const</span> prng <span class="pl-c1">=</span> <span class="pl-en">randomSeeded</span>(<span class="pl-c1">1n</span>);

<span class="pl-en">assertEquals</span>(<span class="pl-en">randomIntegerBetween</span>(<span class="pl-c1">1</span>, <span class="pl-c1">10</span>, { prng }), <span class="pl-c1">3</span>);
</code></pre>
